The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 06 October is 454,176 (806.9 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 02 October, there were 60,025 new confirmed cases (106.6 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 25 September, there were 37,027 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 62% (22998 extra cases).
